summary: This is a work in progress. SSAO and DOF. This is another ENB graphic mod that improved the visuals. Special features include a custom ENB 113 profile, This enb is highend hardware user only.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Name: Licun\'s Skyrim ENB
Version: 0.0
Latest Modified Date: 2012.06.16

Mod Author: Licun
Readme Author: Licun
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 ?I\'m not Show up to this Enb, Elderscroll7 Kor Community Cafe.
 ?This enb is highend hardware user only.



 - How to Install?
============================================================================

 ?Please Do Not USE Nexus Modmanager



 1. Extract the file to a temporary location.
 2. Open the Licun-113-Enb folder,

 copy All of Files (d3d9.dll, d3d9_SMAA.dll, effect, enbbloom.fx, enbeffect.fx,
enbeffectprepass.fx, enbinjector, enbpalette, enbseries.dll, enbseries, injector, 
SMAA.fx and, SMAA.h)

 Place these files in the same location as your Skyrim.exe file.
 

(Optional) Copy the DATA File. Put them into Skyrim\'s Data Folder.
this is lightning Patch File.


 3. Open enbseries located in Skyrim.exe folder. 

 Pleas Check [EFFECT] EnableSunRays=true.

 and Change [RAYS] SunRaysMultiplier=0.7 

 and Save and Exit.


 4. Now Open the official Skyrim launcher or other launcher and make sure the 
 licun Lighting patch.esps are activated and in the right load order.

 5. Start the game normally through official launcher or other supported launchers.
 6. If there is anything you would like to change afterward, check the Customization, Tweaking.
 7. And Enjoy Skyrim!


------


[youtube]4CLnqjxQcwQ[/youtube]

Made by - hodilton

Thanks!
author: Licun
